com.labuts.finalproject.dao

Interface AccommodationDao

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AbstractDao<Accommodation>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AccommodationDaoImpl

    public interface AccommodationDao
extends AbstractDao<Accommodation>
    Create AccommodationDao from AbstractDao AccommodationDao class is used to to make Accommodation requests to database
